title: Best stereo amplifiers
text:

A stereo amplifier is the powerhouse of your hi-fi system, and whether you want a stripped-out minimalist design or one with all the bells and whistles, here's our current list of the best on the market. 
Hi-fi amplifiers were unchanged for decades, their analogue connections favouring music played on CD players and turntables . 
But with laptops, smartphones and streaming services gaining ground as music sources, the stereo amp has had to evolve, with built-in DACs (digital-to-analogue converters), USB connections and wireless streaming now becoming increasingly important. Here's a list of our current favourites.
